Technique: DOVETAIL (JOINT); WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Greek papyrus
Description: The alexandrian poet Apollonius of Rhodes, who lived during the third century before Christ,  wrote the epic "Argonauts".  This work recounts the story of the Greek heroes Jason and the Argonauts. The fragment of papyrus (P. Oxy.VI 885) is an extract from Book III (727-745) tells of the conquest of  the Golden Fleece.
